mapper.sql: TOUCH_ID, TENANT_ID, PROVINCE_ID, INSPECTION_ID, PLAN_ID, CHECK_STAFF_ID, CHECK_STAFF_NAME, CHECKED_STAFF_ID, CHECKED_STAFF_NAME, IS_OPERATE, HUNGUP_TYPE, CALL_TYPE, VOICE_SATISFY_EXTENT, RECORD_TIME, CALLING_NUMBER, CALLED_NUMBER, SATISFY_EXTENT_TYPE, VIP_SATISFY_EXTENT, MEDIA_TYPE, SRV_REQST_TYPE_ID, SRV_REQST_TYPE_NM, SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM, CHECKED_TIME, OPERATE_TIME, STRATEGY_NAME, ORG_TYPE, RESERVE_1, RESERVE_2, RESERVE_3, RESERVE_4, RESERVE_5, RESERVE_6, RESERVE_7, RESERVE_8

select
distinct
from t_qm_voice_pool
order by ${orderByClause}
